segments.text: Hey , Vernassa . why be angry look ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the new neighbor . I hate her guts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've never seen you so worked up . what did she do to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She made another white crack about my clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure she was trying to put you down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You shall go easy on her . she is new here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just how am I supposed to do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You shall just take it in surprise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've tried , but she keeps pushing my buttons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try to pull it together , Vernassa . I am sure things will turn note , ok ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not . she is no picnic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . if you think I can help , let me know .
segments.speaker: S1
